config.golden_days.bricks.tooltip:
Alpha -> Beta 1.6: Alpha
Beta 1.7 -> Release 1.13: Modern

Changes the texture of Bricks
config.golden_days.bushy_leaves.tooltip:
Gives leaves extra foliage, inspired by Better Foliage

§cIncreases the amount of geometry in the leaves which can cause lag on lower-end systems
config.golden_days.chest_model.tooltip:
Indev -> Beta 1.7: Beta
Beta 1.8+: Modern
Hybrid: §cREQUIRES EMF

Changes the models and textures of Chests
config.golden_days.cloud_height.tooltip:
Infdev -> Beta 1.7: 108
Beta 1.8 -> Release 1.17: 128
Release 1.18+: 192

Changes the height of clouds in the Overworld
config.golden_days.cobblestone.tooltip:
Classic -> Beta 1.6: Classic
Beta 1.7 -> Release 1.13: Modern

Changes the texture of Cobblestone
config.golden_days.disable_flat_items.to:
Classic -> Release 1.3: false
Release 1.4+: true

Removes the flat dropped item model in Golden Days
config.golden_days.end_style.tooltip:
Release 1.0 -> 1.2: Early Release
Release 1.3+: Modern

§e[W.I.P]§r Custom: Changes the vibe of The End by adding clouds, stars, and the Overworld sky
config.golden_days.fast_grass.tooltip:
Alpha -> Beta 1.5: true
Fast Graphics Alpha -> Release 1.8: true

Removes the tinted overlay on the sides of Grass Blocks to match how they looked with Fast Graphics enabled in older versions
config.golden_days.flatten_skin_layers.t:
Classic -> Release 1.7: true
Release 1.8+: false

Flattens the second layer of player skins to imitate the look of skins before the second layer was added. §cREQUIRES EMF
config.golden_days.oak_log_tops.tooltip:
Classic -> Release 1.6: true
Release 1.7+: false

Makes all Overworld logs have Oak Log tops
config.golden_days.picture_perfect.toolt: §cReplaces EVERY block in the game with one from Beta... only intended for screenshots
config.golden_days.shadowed_leaves.toolt:
Classic -> Beta 1.7: false
Beta 1.8+: true

Enables ambient occlusion on leaves
config.golden_days.silent_chests.tooltip:
Classic -> Beta 1.7: true
Beta 1.8+: false

Removes the opening and closing sound of chests
config.golden_days.use_overlay_ctm.toolt:
Some blocks will overlay their texture on adjacent blocks

§eIf you are using Golden Days Alpha, you must change this to §a§lno_tint §eor else the grass texture will not match

§cREQUIRES CONTINUITY
config.golden_days.use_shaders.tooltip:
Used for lighting, fog, and disabling chunk blending on load

§cCore shaders can cause issues with many mods. Disabling might increase mod compatibility
config.golden_days.xp_bar_style.tooltip:
Classic -> Beta 1.7: hidden
Beta 1.8+: modern
Custom: Removes the XP bar and moves other UI elements to fill the gap

§cHiding the XP bar could cause issues with other mods installed
golden_days.presets.tooltip: A mix of presets based on actual Minecraft versions.
